# Incident Response Template

## Incident Details

**Incident ID:** [AUTO-GENERATED: YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS]
**Reported By:** [Your Name]
**Report Time:** [Timestamp]
**Severity Level:** [CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]

## Incident Classification

**Category:**
- [ ] Application Error
- [ ] Infrastructure Failure
- [ ] Security Incident
- [ ] Performance Issue
- [ ] Data Issue
- [ ] External Dependency Failure
- [ ] Human Error
- [ ] Other: ________________

**Affected Components:**
- [ ] Main Trading Bot
- [ ] Monitoring System
- [ ] Alert System
- [ ] Database/Storage
- [ ] Network Connectivity
- [ ] External APIs (Polygon, Polymarket, Telegram)
- [ ] Other: ________________

## Impact Assessment

**Business Impact:**
- [ ] Trading stopped/frozen
- [ ] Financial loss occurred
- [ ] Customer data exposed
- [ ] Service unavailable
- [ ] Performance degraded
- [ ] Monitoring blind spots
- [ ] No immediate impact

**Technical Impact:**
- [ ] System completely down
- [ ] Partial system failure
- [ ] Degraded performance
- [ ] Data corruption/loss
- [ ] Security breach
- [ ] Resource exhaustion

**Estimated Financial Impact:** $_______

**Affected Users/Services:**
- Internal systems only
- External customers affected
- Regulatory reporting impact
- Compliance implications

### Chronological Events

| Time | Event | Action Taken | Responsible |
|------|-------|--------------|-------------|
| HH:MM | Incident detected | | |
| HH:MM | Team notified | | |
| HH:MM | Investigation started | | |
| HH:MM | Root cause identified | | |
| HH:MM | Containment implemented | | |
| HH:MM | Resolution deployed | | |
| HH:MM | Verification completed | | |

## Investigation Details

### Symptoms Observed
- [List specific error messages, logs, alerts, user reports]

### Initial Assessment
- [What was the first indication of a problem?]
- [What systems/components were affected?]
- [What was the immediate impact?]

### Root Cause Analysis

**Primary Cause:**
[Describe the root cause of the incident]

**Contributing Factors:**
- [List any contributing factors or preconditions]

**Technical Details:**
```
[Include relevant logs, error messages, code snippets, system state]
```

**Impact Analysis:**
- [How did this cause the observed symptoms?]
- [What was the full scope of impact?]

## Response Actions

### Immediate Containment
- [What was done to stop the incident from getting worse?]
- [Were any emergency rollback procedures used?]
- [Was service interrupted for users?]

### Investigation Steps
- [What diagnostic procedures were followed?]
- [What tools/logs were reviewed?]
- [Who was involved in the investigation?]

### Resolution Steps
- [What was done to fix the issue?]
- [Were any hotfixes deployed?]
- [Was a full rollback performed?]

### Verification Steps
- [How was the fix verified?]
- [What tests were performed?]
- [How long was the system monitored post-resolution?]

## Communication

### Internal Communication
- [Who was notified and when?]
- [What channels were used (Slack, email, calls)?]
- [How was the team kept updated?]

### External Communication
- [Were customers/users notified?]
- [What was communicated and when?]
- [Was a status page updated?]

### Regulatory Reporting
- [Was any regulatory notification required?]
- [What was reported and to whom?]
- [Timeline of regulatory communications]

## Recovery and Prevention

### Recovery Procedures
- [What was done to restore full service?]
- [Were there any data recovery requirements?]
- [How was system confidence restored?]

### Short-term Mitigations
- [What temporary measures were put in place?]
- [How long were they needed?]
- [When were they removed?]

### Long-term Prevention
- [What permanent fixes were implemented?]
- [What monitoring improvements were made?]
- [What process changes were implemented?]

**Preventive Actions:**
1. [Specific action item]
2. [Specific action item]
3. [Specific action item]

---

*This incident response template should be completed within 24 hours of incident resolution. All critical incidents must have a full post-mortem review within one week.*
